attributes.action: Ban bus adverts that promote atheism
attributes.additional_details:
People shouldn't be bothered by bus advert promoting athiesm such as " God probaly doesnt exist, now enjoy your lifes"
people of all backgrounds shouldn't be bothered by such pointless athiest propaganda, and should be allowed to have a bus journey without being offended. The mere notion of this advert claiming people who believe in a diety has a non enjoyable life is offensive and is behaviour excerted by bullies.
so these athiest bus adverts should be removed.
Preaching any belief by bullying is wrong.

rejection.details: This is an issue for the Advertising Standards Authority (which is independent of Government).
